Notes

Packaged in a gatefold cardboard sleeve. Includes printed inner sleeves, a printed lyric insert, and a download code card. Studios/recorded at: Dreamland, Hurley, NY Five Star Studios, Echo Park, CA Miner Street, Philly, PA Magic Shop, NYC Fluxivity, Brooklyn, NY Vacation Island, Brooklyn, NY 'Wakin On A Pretty Daze' was recorded (mostly) May-Nov 2012 A2 and D1 recorded in February 2012 Mike Levy and Dan Murphy appear courtesy of Icy Signs Farmer Dave Scher appears courtesy of Sub Pop Records Stella Mozgawa and Emily Kokal appear courtesy of Rough Trade Records All songs written by Kurt Vile, © copyright 2012 Printed on back artwork: ℗ & © 2013 Matador Records Printed on LP labels: ℗ 2013 © 2013 Matador Records
